questionText: What is an intent message in IOTA?

answerOptions.answerText: A message containing serialized transaction data
A compact struct that a signature commits to
A user signature for transaction data
A domain separator for signing messages

questionText: Which of the following is a benefit of the intent signing standard in IOTA?

answerOptions.answerText: It uses a Rust struct tag name as a prefix
It replaces the intent scope with a compact u8 representation
It requires all data to implement the Signable trait
It simplifies transaction validation for Rust applications
